title: Why Do I suck and almost always lose lane unless my laner is brain dead or afk
body: Besides farm why do I almost always lose lane I try soo hard but I just completely flop when i play aggressive i get killed and when I play defensive I get killed I need help I only do well if I'm carried or the enemy leaner is really bad

replies.body: No one can tell you that from your OP.GG alone, they would need to watch a game or something.
how do i show my game

Just get a coach and go on skype and share your screen while you show them a replay. [One challenger coach dude on gumtree](https://www.gumtree.com.au/s-ad/bankstown/video-games/league-of-legends-lessons-and-improvement/1168385684) does this for $10 an hour, its pretty good value.

Ill point out a what mistakes i can.

Your cs is low. Consistantly.
On shen your item build is not optimal. Why get sunfire cape when you already have titanic to push lane? 
Wrong boot type in quite a few of your matches. 

Other than that i cant tell if you are grouping, trading, team fighting or using tp correctly or not.

You should really practice it then as your largest gold income in the game is going to be last hitting. By lasting hitting you put yourself at a gold advantage so that you have items. Try not to make excuses, as no one has perfect cs but you have to try harder and aim for 8 cs per min across your games.

Use your (in-game) surroundings to understand the game and situation and ask yourself questions. Look at your mini map, is he on your side? If he is, okay play safe, avoid over-committing and face checking. Are you laning against a tank or assasin? If it’s a tank you can punish him early, if it’s an assasin you should probably play safe. What cooldowns has he used? Can I make a positive trade? What item should I build? These are just some thoughts that I think about in-game.
